Quick search

Welcome to Payments Hub’s documentation!¶

What is Payments Hub?¶

Payments Hub is a free and open-source framework for voluntary payment integration into different publishing channels based on Symfony Framework.

Note

This documentation assumes you have already a working knowledge of the Symfony Framework. If you’re not familiar with Symfony, please start with reading the Quick Tour from the Symfony documentation.
